info_banners.reg_title: Register and get access to the Privilege Program and exclusive offers for members
info_banners.reg_description: Join our Privilege Program and get access to exclusive offers, discounts, and events available only to members. Stay up to date with all new products and special deals!
info_banners.loyalty_addition_description: You can check your bonus balance in your account

cart_page.firstGift: A gift for the first order

home_delivery_info.title: Delivery of Prime Foods Marbled Beef across Russia
home_delivery_info.after_title: Marbled beef is now even closer
home_delivery_info.arrow_text_first: Note: If the average weight is specified on the product card, it may vary slightly after the order is assembled.
home_delivery_info.arrow_text_second: If ordered after 20:15, your order will be processed the next day.
home_delivery_info.arrow_text_third: After the order is assembled, you will receive an invoice and a payment link via email. We’ll also send the link via SMS from Prime Foods.

footer.privacy_policy_checkbox_step_1: By clicking the "Subscribe" button, I confirm that I have read
footer.privacy_policy_checkbox_step_2: and I agree to the processing of personal data

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.noAnswer: Didn’t find the answer? Ask a question
faq.weWillContact: We will contact you and provide a consultation. Our experts will always help you make a choice
faq.fullCycleDescription: from raising bulls to their fattening and butchering
faq.feeding200DaysDescription: only on the basis of a five-component corn mix, which ensures even fat distribution in the muscle tissue and gives the meat juiciness, tenderness, and a slightly sweet taste
faq.perfectGeneticsDescription: only young bulls of beef breeds, mainly Aberdeen Angus, are used for production
faq.wideChoiceDescription: steaks, entrecotes, fillets, pulp, tenderloin, brisket, shoulder, ribs, etc.
faq.highMarbling: Highest marbling — marbling gives the meat incredible tenderness and a rich, delicate flavor

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.firstGift: A gift for the first order
checkout.pickUpBonus: + {n} point for pickup|+ {n} points for pickup
checkout.fill_data_note: Fill in the details, this will determine the delivery cost and the final order amount
checkout.payment_note: Pay for the order online or in cash to the courier
checkout.confirmation_note: Confirmation will be sent to your email or phone number. You can also view order details on the website in your personal account
checkout.payment_after_assembly: Payment is made only after the order is assembled
checkout.from_address_note: Assortment, prices and terms depend on the delivery address
checkout.delivery_details_note: Delivery details may change depending on the chosen delivery method and address
checkout.final_order_sum_note: Final order amount is calculated after the order is assembled in the warehouse
checkout.payment_link_sent: A payment link has been sent to you via SMS
checkout.no_sms_note: If you do not receive the SMS, please contact technical support
checkout.confirmation_email_sent: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address
checkout.contact_us_if: Contact us if you have any questions or problems with placing an order
